original_text: The horses had great power in their mouths and in their tails. Their tails were like snakes, with heads that could hurt people very much.
korean_text: 이 말들의 힘은 입과 꼬리에 있으니 꼬리는 뱀 같고 또 꼬리에 머리가 있어 이것으로 해하더라

sentences.original_text: The horses had great power in their mouths
sentences.korean_translation: 말들은 그들의 입에 큰 힘을 가지고 있었고

sentences.original_text: with heads that could hurt people very much
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들을 매우 아프게 할 수 있는 머리를 가지고 있었습니다
